availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, grocer and retail liquor dealer. Native of Germany. Married to Sophia Gramer. Father of John Gramer, Mary Gramer, Thressa Gramer, Antonio Gramer, and Maggie Gramer. Grocer and liquor dealer in Campbell County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Internal Revenue Assessment Lists for Kentucky, 1862-1866 NARA RG 58, Microfilm Series M768, Roll 1, Campbell County, Kentucky, 1863, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Campbell County, KY, June-July 1862, p. 42, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, p. 207B
Find A Grave, "Sebastion Gramer (1826-1906)," Memorial #156815594, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/156815594 (accessed September 13, 2019).
